import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import edailogo from '../EdAI Logo.png' import '../LandingPage.css' import SwipeableList from './SwipeableList' const LandingPage = () => { return (

Unlocking Knowledge,

Accessible to all!

EdAI addresses educational challenges faced by underserved students in Africa. Their AI-enabled learning platform offers comprehensive content, interactive tools, and personalized experiences to bridge the gap in affordable and quality education, empowering students for academic and personal growth.

Curriculum Details

Testimonials

I've been using the AI education platform for a few months now, and it has truly transformed my learning experience. The personalized recommendations and adaptive learning paths have helped me focus on my weak areas and accelerate my progress. The interactive lessons and instant feedback make studying engaging and effective. I highly recommend this platform to anyone looking to enhance their education journey with AI technology.

) } export default LandingPage;
